page.title: 05Broadoak Quarry
page.content: This quarry has been in existance for 35 years.It employs 11 people permanently and x number of lorry drivers depending on the demand for sand and gravel. The raw materials are shovelled from the quarry face into dumper trucks,taken to a hopper and separated into sand and stone.The sand is washed and taken on an escalator to be transferred onto wagons.The stone is crushed into gravel and stored for deliveries.The water for washing is circulated from a stream.It is pumped to the plant,used,fed into a pond,filtered into a reservoir and feeds back into the stream.Trout are stocked and fished. The quarry policy is to restore the land to its original condition.
